Interface IResponse

All Known Implementing Classes:
Response
public interface IResponse

  • Method Details

    • getHeaders

      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> getHeaders()
      Returns:
      Returns a writable map of the response headers. Never returns null.

    • getContentLength

      int getContentLength()
      Returns:
      Returns the content length or 0 if no content is set yet.

    • getContentType

      java.lang.String getContentType()
      Returns:
      Gets the content type of the response.

    • setContentType

      void setContentType​(java.lang.String contentType)
      Parameters:
      contentType - Sets the content type of the response.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalStateException - A specialized implementation may throw a InvalidOperationException when the content type is set by the implementation.

    • getStatusCode

      int getStatusCode()
      Returns:
      Gets the current status code. An Exceptions is thrown, if no status code was set.

    • setStatusCode

      void setStatusCode​(int status)
      Parameters:
      status - Sets the current status code.

    • getStatus

      java.lang.String getStatus()
      Returns:
      Returns the status code as string. (200 OK)

    • addHeader

      void addHeader​(java.lang.String header, java.lang.String value)
      Adds or replaces a response header in the headers map
      Parameters:
      header -
      value -

    • getServerHeader

      java.lang.String getServerHeader()
      Returns:
      Returns the Server response header. Defaults to "BIF-BIF.SWE1-Server".

    • setServerHeader

      void setServerHeader​(java.lang.String server)
      Sets the Server response header.
      Parameters:
      server -

    • setContent

      void setContent​(java.lang.String content)
      Parameters:
      content - Sets a string content. The content will be encoded in UTF-8.

    • setContent

      void setContent​(byte[] content)
      Parameters:
      content - Sets a byte[] as content.

    • setContent

      void setContent​(java.io.InputStream stream)
      Parameters:
      stream - Sets the stream as content.

    • send

      void send​(java.io.OutputStream network)
      Parameters:
      network - Sends the response to the network stream.
